content.original: Ultra Light LAM Aluminium Armor was conceived during the Star League, attempting to create an Armor that is Durable and Lightweight enough to allow Flight Systems
content.prevOriginal: Ultra Light LAM Aluminium Armor was conceived during the Star League, attempting to create an Armor that is Durable and Lightweight enough to allow Flight Systems
content.content: 超轻陆空机甲(LAM)铝合金装甲是在星联时期构思的,目的是打造一种耐用、重量轻、足以支飞行系统的装甲.

content.original: Advances in Clan Ferro-Fibrous Armor technology allow this Ultra Light Armor to save weight for a LAM's protection and even provides the ability to upgrade to Clan Case II Systems. CASE Enabled
content.prevOriginal: Advances in Clan Ferro-Fibrous Armor technology allow this Ultra Light Armor to save weight for a LAM's protection and even provides the ability to upgrade to Clan Case II Systems. CASE Enabled
content.content: 先进的氏族纤维钢装甲技术使这种超轻装甲能够减轻LAM的防护重量,甚至能够使用氏族CASE II系统启用CASE

content.original: Created by Clan Snow Raven during the Trials for the Ferro-Lamellor Armor offers this Armor Superb Protection but being prohibitively expensive and Bulky. CASE Enabled
content.prevOriginal: Created by Clan Snow Raven during the Trials for the Ferro-Lamellor Armor offers this Armor Superb Protection but being prohibitively expensive and Bulky. CASE Enabled
content.content: 由雪鸦氏族在纹层(Lamellor)钢的实验中创造,这种装甲提供了极好的保护,但由于很昂贵笨重而很少使用 启用CASE

content.original: An Attempt to create advanced Recon Units has Shengli Arm's incorporated their latest advanced of Stealth tech into a LAM Alumium Armor. It Includes a Specialized CASE System. Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires an ECM.
content.prevOriginal: An Attempt to create advanced Recon Units has Shengli Arm's incorporated their latest advanced of Stealth tech into a LAM Alumium Armor. It Includes a Specialized CASE System. Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires an ECM.
content.content: 为了创建先进的侦查单位,胜利武器公司将其最新的先进隐身技术整合到一种LAM铝合金装甲中.它包含一个特殊的CASE系统.除了头部,每个部位都占用一个槽位.需要一个ECM.

content.original: Makes the carrier much harder to detect with stealth
content.prevOriginal: Makes the carrier much harder to detect with stealth
content.content: 使携带隐身设备的单位更难被发现和侦测

content.original: An Attempt to create advanced Recon Units has Shengli Arm's incorporated their latest advanced of Stealth tech into a LAM Alumium Armor. Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires an ECM.
content.prevOriginal: An Attempt to create advanced Recon Units has Shengli Arm's incorporated their latest advanced of Stealth tech into a LAM Alumium Armor. Reserves 1 slot in every Location except the Head and requires an ECM.
content.content: 为了创建先进的侦查单位,胜利武器公司将其最新的先进隐身技术整合到一种LAM铝合金装甲中.它包含一个特殊的CASE系统.除了头部,每个部位都占用一个槽位.需要一个ECM.

content.original: A internal storage and transport Bay specifically designed to allow a LAM to increase its ability to carry Battle Armor Bays.
content.prevOriginal: A internal storage and transport Bay specifically designed to allow a LAM to increase its ability to carry Battle Armor Bays.
content.content: 一个专门设计的内部储存运输舱,可以让LAM获得携带战斗装甲的能力.

content.original:
This is a specially designed compartment designed to allow a LAM to carry Battle Armor squads into the fray quickly and efficiently. 

 <b><color=#ffcc00>Can carry 1 Battle Armor Squad</color>
content.prevOriginal:
This is a specially designed compartment designed to allow a LAM to carry Battle Armor squads into the fray quickly and efficiently. 

 <b><color=#ffcc00>Can carry 1 Battle Armor Squad</color>
content.content: 这是一个专门设计的隔间,可以让一个LAM携带战斗装甲小队有效快速地进入战斗.

content.original:
This is a specially designed compartment designed to allow a LAM to carry Battle Armor squads into the fray quickly and efficiently. 

 <b><color=#ffcc00>Can carry 2 Battle Armor Squad</color>
content.prevOriginal:
This is a specially designed compartment designed to allow a LAM to carry Battle Armor squads into the fray quickly and efficiently. 

 <b><color=#ffcc00>Can carry 2 Battle Armor Squad</color>
content.content: 这是一个专门设计的隔间,可以让一个LAM携带战斗装甲小队有效地快速进入战斗.

content.original:
This is a specially designed compartment designed to allow a LAM to carry Battle Armor squads into the fray quickly and efficiently. 

 <b><color=#ffcc00>Can carry 3 Battle Armor Squad</color>
content.prevOriginal:
This is a specially designed compartment designed to allow a LAM to carry Battle Armor squads into the fray quickly and efficiently. 

 <b><color=#ffcc00>Can carry 3 Battle Armor Squad</color>
content.content: 这是一个特别设计的隔间，旨在让一个LAM携带战斗装甲小队快速有效地进入战斗。

content.original:
This is a specially designed compartment designed to allow a LAM to carry Battle Armor squads into the fray quickly and efficiently. 

 <b><color=#ffcc00>Can carry 4 Battle Armor Squad</color>
content.prevOriginal:
This is a specially designed compartment designed to allow a LAM to carry Battle Armor squads into the fray quickly and efficiently. 

 <b><color=#ffcc00>Can carry 4 Battle Armor Squad</color>
content.content: 这是一个特别设计的隔间，旨在让一个LAM携带战斗装甲小队快速有效地进入战斗。

content.original: A LandAirMech External Hardpoint System capable of swapping through a multitude of Munitions. All Stats of this Weapon are derived from loaded Munitions Requires Specialist Slot and (HP) Munitions
content.prevOriginal: A LandAirMech External Hardpoint System capable of swapping through a multitude of Munitions. All Stats of this Weapon are derived from loaded Munitions Requires Specialist Slot and (HP) Munitions
content.content: 能够容纳更换多种弹药的陆空机甲外部挂载点系统. 该武器所有的状态都来自其装载的弹药 需要特殊糟和(HP)弹药.

content.original: A Unique NARC Launcher System for Aerial Reconnaissance Units. Sporting a extended Range and Targeting System to reliably paint targets during High speed maneuvers.
content.prevOriginal: A Unique NARC Launcher System for Aerial Reconnaissance Units. Sporting a extended Range and Targeting System to reliably paint targets during High speed maneuvers.
content.content: 一种用于空中侦查单位的独特NARC发射系统.具有额外的射程和瞄准系统,可在高速机动时可靠的描绘目标.

content.original: This target was Narc'ed. +2 to hit and +1 with Missiles.
content.prevOriginal: This target was Narc'ed. +2 to hit and +1 with Missiles.
content.content: 这各目标被NARC系统标记了,+2命中并且使用导弹额外+1
目标寻获装备增加可见性

content.original: Shares Sensor Information on nearby Targets
content.prevOriginal: Shares Sensor Information on nearby Targets
content.content: 共享附近目标的传感器信息

content.original: Visual indicator of the NARC effect
content.prevOriginal: Visual indicator of the NARC effect

content.original: A Specialized Aerial TAG System specifically designed for Deep Recon Units. Its Unique Effect grants a massive but decaying Detection Bonus that cannot be Stacked.
content.prevOriginal: A Specialized Aerial TAG System specifically designed for Deep Recon Units. Its Unique Effect grants a massive but decaying Detection Bonus that cannot be Stacked.
content.content: 一种专门为侦查单位设计的空中目标寻获装备(TAG)系统.其独特的效果提供了不可叠加范围大但有衰减的探测增益.

content.original: This target was TAG'ed. +1 to hit.
content.prevOriginal: This target was TAG'ed. +1 to hit.

content.content: 目标寻获装备增加可见性

content.original: Shares Sensor Information on nearby Targets
content.prevOriginal: Shares Sensor Information on nearby Targets
content.content: 共享附近目标的传感器信息
目标寻获装备增加可见性

content.original: Shares Sensor Information on nearby Targets
content.prevOriginal: Shares Sensor Information on nearby Targets
content.content: 共享附近目标的传感器信息

content.prevOriginal: Shares Sensor Information on nearby Targets

content.original: The Land Air Mech (LAM) Engine provides a specialized energy concept that allows the Mech to Change into a Wing in Ground Effect (WiGE) Unit. Unit can Change between LAM and 'Mech Mode. Land Air Mech (LAM) Mode: Mech will Hover above the Battlefield. Mech Walk Speeds Translate into Flight Speed. LAM Turbines provide additional 'Walk' Speed in Flight. When in LAM Mode, Unit can perform Extremely Long Jumps at increased Heat('Afterburner') When in LAM Mode, Unit will not be affected by Terrain/Ground
content.prevOriginal: The Land Air Mech (LAM) Engine provides a specialized energy concept that allows the Mech to Change into a Wing in Ground Effect (WiGE) Unit. Unit can Change between LAM and 'Mech Mode. Land Air Mech (LAM) Mode: Mech will Hover above the Battlefield. Mech Walk Speeds Translate into Flight Speed. LAM Turbines provide additional 'Walk' Speed in Flight. When in LAM Mode, Unit can perform Extremely Long Jumps at increased Heat('Afterburner') When in LAM Mode, Unit will not be affected by Terrain/Ground
content.content: 陆空机甲(LAM)引擎提供了一个特殊的能量概念.使机甲能够转变为地效机翼(WiGE)单位. 单位可以在陆空机甲(LAM)模式和普通机甲(Mech)模式切换. 陆空机甲(LAM)模式:机甲会悬停在战场上,机甲的行走速度转换为飞行速度. LAM涡轮在飞行中提供额外的"行走"速度. 在LAM模式下,机甲可以以增加热量("加力")为代价下进行超长距离跳跃. 在LAM模式下,机甲不会受到地形地面的影响.

content.original: The Land Air Mech (LAM) Engine provides a specialized energy concept that allows the Mech to Change into a Wing in Ground Effect (WiGE) Unit. Unit can Change between LAM and 'Mech Mode. Land Air Mech (LAM) Mode: Mech will Hover above the Battlefield. Mech Walk Speeds Translate into Flight Speed. LAM Turbines provide additional 'Walk' Speed in Flight. When in LAM Mode, Unit can perform Extremely Long Jumps at increased Heat('Afterburner') When in LAM Mode, Unit will not be affected by Terrain/Ground
content.prevOriginal: The Land Air Mech (LAM) Engine provides a specialized energy concept that allows the Mech to Change into a Wing in Ground Effect (WiGE) Unit. Unit can Change between LAM and 'Mech Mode. Land Air Mech (LAM) Mode: Mech will Hover above the Battlefield. Mech Walk Speeds Translate into Flight Speed. LAM Turbines provide additional 'Walk' Speed in Flight. When in LAM Mode, Unit can perform Extremely Long Jumps at increased Heat('Afterburner') When in LAM Mode, Unit will not be affected by Terrain/Ground

content.content: 陆空机甲(LAM)引擎提供了一个特殊的能量概念.使机甲能够转变为地效机翼(WiGE)单位. 单位可以在陆空机甲(LAM)模式和普通机甲(Mech)模式切换. 陆空机甲(LAM)模式:机甲会悬停在战场上,机甲的行走速度转换为飞行速度. LAM涡轮在飞行中提供额外的"行走"速度. 在LAM模式下,机甲可以以增加热量("加力")为代价下进行超长距离跳跃. 在LAM模式下,机甲不会受到地形地面的影响.

content.original: A Dropship Turbine is a specialized LAM Turbine System capable of providing the thrust required for a small dropship Lift and even reaching Escape Velocity when required
content.prevOriginal: A Dropship Turbine is a specialized LAM Turbine System capable of providing the thrust required for a small dropship Lift and even reaching Escape Velocity when required
content.content: 登陆舰涡轮是一种特殊的LAM涡轮系统,能够提供小型登陆舰升起时所必须的推力,甚至能够在需要时加速到逃逸速度.
更强的近战和更快的速度

content.original: Long range missiles, capable of dealing moderate damage at long range. Each missile lacks punch, but in a group they can deal significant damage.
content.prevOriginal: Long range missiles, capable of dealing moderate damage at long range. Each missile lacks punch, but in a group they can deal significant damage.
content.content: 远程导弹,能够在远距离上造成中等伤害.单发导弹缺乏攻击力,但如果一组导弹命中会造成大量伤害.

content.original: High Explosive warhead with AOE and minefield clearance, but low direct damage
content.prevOriginal: High Explosive warhead with AOE and minefield clearance, but low direct damage
content.content: 具有AOE伤害和雷场清理能力的高爆弹头,但是直接伤害低

content.prevOriginal: Air-To-Ground Missile with a Cluster Bomb Payload

带有自动发射装置的热诱弹

content.original: The Phoenix is an advanced Guided Missile system that requires full target lock to fire
content.prevOriginal: The Phoenix is an advanced Guided Missile system that requires full target lock to fire
content.content: '凤凰'是一种先进制导导弹系统,需要完全锁定才能开火

content.original: A Vulcan Rotary Cannon. Exceptional Close Air Support vs Tanks and Battle Armor
content.prevOriginal: A Vulcan Rotary Cannon. Exceptional Close Air Support vs Tanks and Battle Armor
content.content: '火神'转轮加农炮.对坦克和战斗装甲提供近距离空中支援

content.original: A box of High Explosive air dropped Bombs rigged for use in an internal bay with magazine feed.
content.prevOriginal: A box of High Explosive air dropped Bombs rigged for use in an internal bay with magazine feed.
content.content: 一箱在安装在内部弹舱拥有弹箱供弹的高爆空投炸弹.

content.original: A WingMounted Hardpoint System specifically designed to allow LAM's to carry Battle Armor into battle quickly and efficiently in protected Bays.
content.prevOriginal: A WingMounted Hardpoint System specifically designed to allow LAM's to carry Battle Armor into battle quickly and efficiently in protected Bays.
content.content: 一个专门设计的机翼挂载点,可以让LAM在有效保护的内部舱室中携带战斗装甲(BA)快速进入战斗.

content.original: A internal storage and transport Bay specifically designed to allow LAM's to carry additional freight like Hard Point Munitions or HandHeld Weapons
content.prevOriginal: A internal storage and transport Bay specifically designed to allow LAM's to carry additional freight like Hard Point Munitions or HandHeld Weapons
content.content: 一个内部存储和运输舱,专门被设计以使LAM运输额外货物,如挂载的弹药和手持武器

content.original: Originally conceived during the Star League era, the Land-Air 'Mech (or LAM) is a hybrid military unit capable of transforming between BattleMech and Aerospace Fighter forms. This ability conveys great speed and flexibility at the cost of power and protection.
content.prevOriginal: Originally conceived during the Star League era, the Land-Air 'Mech (or LAM) is a hybrid military unit capable of transforming between BattleMech and Aerospace Fighter forms. This ability conveys great speed and flexibility at the cost of power and protection.
content.content: 陆空机甲(LAM)最初构想于星联时代,是一种能够在地面机甲和航空战斗机间转换的混合型军事单位.这种能力以动力和防护为代价,获得了极大的速度和灵活性.

content.content: 该单位从移动中获得额外的闪避(直到最大值).

content.original: A Word of Blake invention, incorporating advances from Composite and Endo Steel Research have they managed to make a far lighter Conversation Gear for their Celestial LAM's
content.prevOriginal: A Word of Blake invention, incorporating advances from Composite and Endo Steel Research have they managed to make a far lighter Conversation Gear for their Celestial LAM's
content.content: 布莱克之道的发明,结合先进的复合材料和内构钢研究的进展,他们成功为他们的天狼星陆空机甲开发了更轻的模式转换设备.

content.original: Land Air Mech's require a specialized internal Structure that houses their Bulky and Heavy Conversation Gear, this makes them incompatible with any other Structure.
content.prevOriginal: Land Air Mech's require a specialized internal Structure that houses their Bulky and Heavy Conversation Gear, this makes them incompatible with any other Structure.
content.content: 陆空机甲需要一个专门的内部结构来容纳他们笨重的转换设备,这使得他们与任何其他结构都不兼容.

content.original: A Star League attempt to use Endo-Steel production processes on LAM Structure, yielding a far lighter Conversation System but at a much Increased Bulk.
content.prevOriginal: A Star League attempt to use Endo-Steel production processes on LAM Structure, yielding a far lighter Conversation System but at a much Increased Bulk.
content.content: 星联试图使用内构钢来制作LAM结构,生产出更轻的转换系统,但体积要大很多

content.original: Word of Blake Scientists in an attempt to create a TSM that is compatible to Land Air Mech's have created these strands, while it does not offer and mobility benefits is it a bit smaller.
content.prevOriginal: Word of Blake Scientists in an attempt to create a TSM that is compatible to Land Air Mech's have created these strands, while it does not offer and mobility benefits is it a bit smaller.
content.content: 布莱克之道的的科学家尝试创造出一种与LAM兼容的TSM,虽然它们不能提供移动优势,但很小.
